testSteps.description: When Click on the login button
When Click on the school "Login as a school" button

children.description: Click on the sign school  landing  button: Login as a school

testSteps.description: When Click on the Log in button

children.description: Click on the log in button

testSteps.description: When Click on the "bookings" button in the header

children.description: Click on the button in the header: bookings

testSteps.description: When Click on the "New Supply Booking" button

children.description: Click on the button: New Supply Booking

testSteps.description:
Then New Supply Booking page contains all necessary text:
| Find Supply Staff |
| START SEARCH |
| SEARCH RESULTS |
| REVIEW INVITATIONS |
| INVITES |
| I want to use my saved search |
| Job Details |
| Name your job posting* |
| Describe the job* |
| 5000 characters left |
| Teacher type* |
| Teacher |
| TA |
| Date(s) required* |
| Note: click on date to switch between full and half day. If the booking is less than half day, please contact us to proceed. |
| Rate* |
| Note: half day is two-third the rate you entered |
| Any specialist subject(s) required? |
| Any age group(s) required? |
| Additional document(s) |
| Anonymisation |
| You have anonymisation turned OFF ON, if you wish to remove any bias in screening procress, please click to turn on. You can always change it in your account setting. |
| I want to save this search for future use |
| Invite a coworker to help you hire - you can easily add any coworkers as an admin in your account setting. |
| SHOW RESULTS |
| Please fill in all required fields to continue |

children.description: New supply booking page contains all necessary text: [Find Supply Staff, START SEARCH, SEARCH RESULTS, REVIEW INVITATIONS, INVITES, I want to use my saved search, Job Details, Name your job posting*, Describe the job*, 5000 characters left, Teacher type*, Teacher, TA, Date(s) required*, Note: click on date to switch between full and half day. If the booking is less than half day, please contact us to proceed., Rate*, Note: half day is two-third the rate you entered, Any specialist subject(s) required?, Any age group(s) required?, Additional document(s), Anonymisation, You have anonymisation turned OFF ON, if you wish to remove any bias in screening procress, please click to turn on. You can always change it in your account setting., I want to save this search for future use, Invite a coworker to help you hire - you can easily add any coworkers as an admin in your account setting., SHOW RESULTS, Please fill in all required fields to continue]
